report.title: Species counts league for event
report.description: An event (date and survey) filtered league table of taxon counts by location. Requires the spatial index builder.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l1 JOIN ( SELECT l.id, count(distinct o.taxon_meaning_id) as count FROM locations l JOIN (index_locations_samples ils JOIN cache_occurrences o ON o.sample_id=ils.sample_id AND o.survey_id=#survey_id# AND o.date_start>='#date_from#' AND o.date_start<='#date_to#' AND o.record_status<>'R' AND o.training=false AND o.website_id IN (#website_ids#) ) ON ils.location_id=l.id WHERE l.deleted=false AND l.location_type_id=#location_type_id# AND l.public=true AND (l.code NOT LIKE ('%+%') OR l.code IS NULL) GROUP BY l.id, l.name ) as l2 ON l2.id=l1.id

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.
